name: Botanical Gardens
description: Need to go on bike, might have to buy snacks, 30 min for to and fro travel time

name: Bike teaching
description: Can be taught in hostel road, can be combined with other activities such as snack

name: Movie in theatre
description: Might cost more for snacks if needed. The time is for amb/atrium/preston theatres. Theatres that are far will need more time.

name: Guitar teaching
description: Guitar needs to be be carried. Can be taught or simply played. Can be done on microsoft road

name: Shilparamam
description: Might cost more for boating. Snacks are additional. Need bike for transport

name: Golconda Fort
description: Will need to check the weather and timings are restricted

name: Cycling
description: Preferably done based on the weather, morning or evening. Can be combined with breakfast if needed. Geared cycles will cost more. Travel to there by bike.
